Body:
dss.dss_lib.DSSProperty_Set_Index(0)
assert dss.Properties.Description().replace(os.linesep, '\n') == u"""Name of bus to which first terminal is connected.
Example:
bus1=busname   (assumes all terminals connected in normal phase order)
bus1=busname.3.1.2.0 (specify terminal to node connections explicitly)"""
assert dss.Properties.Name() == u'bus1'
dss.dss_lib.DSSProperty_Set_Index(0)
assert dss.Properties.Name() == u'bus1'
assert dss.Properties.Value() == u'671'
